info.name: Widget Branding API
info.description: Complete API collection for Widget Branding management in LiveChatLog Dashboard. This allows customization of chat widget appearance and behavior per group.

item.name: Media Upload

formdata.description: Image file to upload (JPEG, PNG, GIF, SVG, WEBP - max 5MB)
Type: logo, icon, or image (optional, defaults to 'image')
Custom file name (optional). UUID will be appended automatically. Example: 'company-logo' becomes 'company-logo_uuid.png'

request.description:
Single unified endpoint to upload any widget media (logo, icon, or image) to Firebase Storage. Specify the mediaType to organize files into appropriate folders (widget_media/logos, widget_media/icons, or widget_media/images). Returns the public URL to use in widget branding API.

Max file size: 5MB
Allowed formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, SVG, WEBP

Parameters:
- file: The image file to upload (required)
- mediaType: Type of media - 'logo', 'icon', or 'image' (optional, defaults to 'image')
- fileName: Custom file name (optional). UUID will be appended automatically for uniqueness.

Examples:
- fileName='company-logo' → saved as 'company-logo_abc123-uuid.png'
- fileName='chat-icon' → saved as 'chat-icon_xyz789-uuid.svg'
- No fileName → saved as 'uuid_timestamp.png' (default)
Delete a widget media file from Firebase Storage using its storage path.

item.description: Single unified endpoint for uploading any widget media (logos, icons, images) to Firebase Storage. Specify mediaType parameter to organize files into appropriate folders. Use the returned fileUrl in widget branding API.
